details.purpose: To document an overall impression of the patient as part of examination.
details.use: Use in conjunction with Conscious state OBSERVATION.

items.items: General assessment of the whole patient by the clinician.
Subjective description of patient's body odour, with respect to self-care.
Description of patient's state and condition of clothing.
Description of observed unusual, abnormal or inappropriate behaviour.
Clinical description of generalised abnormal body movements.
Subject appears to have normal weight for height.
Subject appears slightly overweight for height.
Subject appears slightly underweight for height.
Subject is overweight to the point of ill health.
Subject appears to be of average height.
Subject is well-nourished but not overweight.
General statements about normal appearance and behaviour.
Subject appears to have general wasting.
General description of the global impression of the patient.
Findings related to overall skin appearance.
The extent of the smell detected.
Description of readily apparent mood disturbance.
Details of other obvious abnormalities by simple inspection.
Findings related to sweating and hydration.
